// Filter the user name from given object array whose age is below 30 
let userList = [{
		"name": "john",
		"age": 20
	},
	{
		"name": "andrew",
		"age": 25
	},
	{
		"name": "angela",
		"age": 30
	},
	{
		"name": "erin",
		"age": 20
	},
];

let filteredUser = userList.reduce(function (acc, curr) {
	if (curr.age < 30) {
		acc.push(curr.name);
	}
	return acc;
}, [])

console.log(filteredUser);
